channel.title: Take a journey with me through my eyes
channel.description: Take a journey with me through my eyes

item.title: 100 Brilliant Color Combinations and How to Apply Them to Your Designs
item.description:
100 Brilliant Color Combinations and How to Apply Them to Your Designs

It can attract attention, set a mood, and even influence our emotions and perceptions. But sometimes it can be hard to know where to start when choosing a color palette for your design project. So we've done the hard work for you- giving you 100 color combinations inspired by nature, food & drink, travel, and everyday items. Want to use these color combinations in Canva?

item.title: Photography 101: RAW vs. JPEG | The Ultimate Visual Guide
item.description:
Photography 101: RAW vs. JPEG | The Ultimate Visual Guide

Shooting RAW vs JPEG is a question that every photographer faces at some point. There are many articles out there that cover the topic from the basics of size and quality, to all of the advanced technical details regarding color bits per channel, compression, firmware DCT processing, etc.
